title: Mass Shooting Myth, UFO Truth Coming Soon? 3.24.21
itunes:title: Mass Shooting Myth, UFO Truth Coming Soon? 3.24.21
description:
In episode 843, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Celebrity Book Club's Chelsea Devantez to discuss the Colorado shooting and the Fox News coverage of it, gun violence numbers in the pandemic, Ellen DeGeneres losing viewers, a new UFO report coming out, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Last Week in Boulder, the NRA Struck Down an Assault Weapons Ban. This Week in Boulder, a Massacre.
  2. In a year of pain, one silver lining: fewer mass shootings
  3. Mass shootings in public spaces had become less frequent during the pandemic.
  4. There hasn’t been a single mass shooting in the US since the COVID pandemic took hold; 2020 saw the least mass killings in more than a decade
  5. 2020 Ends as One of America's Most Violent Years in Decades
  6. AP: Mass shootings plummet in 2020
  7. Gun violence grows during coronavirus pandemic group's data shows
  8. Americans bought guns in record numbers in 2020 -- and the surge is continuing
  9. Gun sales to first-time buyers skyrocket amid fears of 'bloody' election and unrest
  10. How the NRA Is Using Coronavirus Fears to Drive Up Gun Sales
  11. Ellen DeGeneres Loses 1 Million Viewers After Apologies for Toxic Workplace
  12. Thanks to Trump-era covid relief bill, a UFO report may soon be public — and it’ll be big, ex-official says
  13. Upcoming UFO report will be 'difficult to explain,' former national intelligence official says
  14. Asher Perlman Cartoonist
  15. LISTEN: K, Le Maestro - MARY J. BLIGE - MY LOVE [KLM FLIP]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
